name: mplbasss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5

stmt.origin: ssrab3(hs0, c0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c4)))

body.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c4))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c0, crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c4))))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)

stmt.origin: mplbas(hs0, c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c4), c2, c3, c4, c5)
stmt.pretty: mplbas(hs0, c0, c1, (0 ` c4), c2, c3, c4, c5)

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, crab(hs0, c1, wbr(cv(hs0), cfsupp, cfv(c0g, c4))))
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmpl, c4))
-| wceq(c5, co(c3, cmps, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
-| wceq(cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(c0g, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(c0g, c4))
-| diffsc(hs0, c3)
-| diffsc(hs0, c4)
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 = { hs0 ∈ c1 | hs0[finSupp](0 ` c4)}
⊣ c2 =(c3[mPoly]c4)
⊣ c5 =(c3[mPwSer]c4)
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c5)
⊣ (0 ` c4)=(0 ` c4)
⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ d(hs0,(0 ` c4))
⊣ d(hs0, c3)
⊣ d(hs0, c4)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmpl, c4))
-| wceq(c5, co(c3, cmps, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
-| wceq(cfv(c0g, c4), cfv(c0g, c4))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(c0g, c4))
-| diffsc(hs0, c3)
-| diffsc(hs0, c4)

|- wss(c0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| wceq(c2, co(c3, cmpl, c4))
-| wceq(c5, co(c3, cmps, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(c0g, c4))
-| diffsc(hs0, c3)
-| diffsc(hs0, c4)

⊣ c0 =(Base ` c2)

⊣ d(hs0, c4)

comment: The set of polynomials is a subset of the set of power series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
